General.Name: Shandong Yanggu Huatai Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Yanggu Huatai Chemical Co., Ltd. operates in the rubber chemicals industry in China. It provides standard rubber chemical, pre-dispersed rubber chemicals, insoluble sulphur, processing promoters, rubber protective waxes, resins, and other products. The company also offers vulcanization, anti-aging, adhesive, processing, and predispersion system additives. In addition, it produces and sells rubber anti-scorcher CTP, rubber accelerator NS, rubber accelerator CBS, rubber accelerator M, and other rubber chemicals; and imports and exports rubber auxiliaries. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Liaocheng, China.
General.Address: No. 399, Qinghe West Road, Liaocheng, China, 252300
